word_mean_info__list.difference: 指用感情说服某人去做某事。如：I persuaded him to go back to work. (我说服他回去工作了。)
表建议，规劝某人应该做某事或如何做。如：He advised me to put my money in the bank. (他劝我把钱存入银行。)
指向某人陈述事实，运用推理或逻辑证明使某人信服。如：We convinced Smith to go by train rather than plane. (我们说服了史密斯乘火车而不乘飞机前往。)
指用好话善意或耐心劝诱、哄骗某人做某事。
语气强，指不断地热情地规劝诱导。
普通用词，指通过劝说、感情交流等而使对方做劝说者所希望的事。
指用讲道理来使某人做某事。
较正式用词，指对一些较重大事情所提出的劝告。有时也用于非正式场合，但仍强调严肃的一面。
指凭行动、事实或言语使他人从思想感情上信服。

bilingual.source: You might be right, but don't try to convince people by arguing.
bilingual.target: 你可能是对的，但不要通过争论来说服人。

bilingual.source: She tried to convince him to go to the doctor.
bilingual.target: 她试图说服他去看医生。

bilingual.source: Your explanation is insufficient to convince me.
bilingual.target: 你的解释不足以说服我。

bilingual.source: She used logical arguments to convince her colleagues.
bilingual.target: 她用逻辑论据说服了同事。

bilingual.source: His paltry excuses did not convince anyone.
bilingual.target: 他的微不足道的借口没有说服任何人。

bilingual.source: His explanation was inadequate to convince the committee.
bilingual.target: 他的解释不足以说服委员会。

bilingual.source: The evidence was telling enough to convince the jury.
bilingual.target: 证据有说服力地足以说服陪审团。

bilingual.source: She tried fruitlessly to convince him to change his mind.
bilingual.target: 她徒劳地试图说服他改变主意。

bilingual.source: When reason fails to convince, they appeal to fear.
bilingual.target: 当理性无法说服时，他们会诉诸恐惧。

list.abstract: Convince（ [kənˈvɪns]），英语单词，作动词用，为使确信；使信服；说服。短语搭配有convince public（说服大众；说服公众），例句为“You will be happy to convince people with bad arguments.（你会很乐意用不好的论据说服别人）”。 Convince及物动词类近义词有assure、reason、satisfy等，Convince副词为convincingly，形容词为convinced、convincing、convincible。

yingyinNormal.en: To convince Garrett, he should retract.
yingyinNormal.zh: 说服Garrett撤回言论。

yingyinNormal.en: How would you convince them to switch to ours?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你要如何说服他转用我们的药呢？

yingyinNormal.en: In return for what? You convince the senator to pull out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你要什么回报？你说服参议员退出。

yingyinNormal.en: If you can convince me to be a silent princess with just a hundred words, imagine how many millions you can convince with this book. You are a salesman, Thomas.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你能仅通过一百字说服我做一位沉默的公主，想想看你这本书将能说服几百万人。你就是推销员，托马斯。

yingyinNormal.en: You'll need to go to my house and find me, convince me of all of this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你得去我家里找我，说服我相信这一切。

yingyinNormal.en: Help me convince him. Take the seat on the court where you belong.
yingyinNormal.zh: 帮我说服他，接受最高法院你应得的那个职位。

yingyinNormal.en: Why didn't you just ask me? If you needed the clinic to convince Doris...
yingyinNormal.zh: 你为什么不问我？如果你需要用诊所说服桃瑞丝。

yingyinNormal.en: You think you can convince Raven to change, to come home? That's splendid.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你认为你能说服瑞文改变？游说她回家？太好了。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm trying to convince you to marry me. That's not the normal purpose of seducers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是想说服你嫁给我啊，这可不是下流男人的最终目的。

yingyinNormal.en: Jackie, I really shouldn't have to convince you to do what it takes to get a set of keys.
yingyinNormal.zh: 杰姬，我想我不需要说服你该如何登上权利的顶端。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, even if you could convince Celia, there's still a big problem. That I'm white.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听着，就算你能说服西莉娅，那也还有个大问题。我是白人。

yingyinNormal.en: And of cause, they want, they know I tried to convince them, but there's no way to discuss it with them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们知道我想说服他们，但我没办法跟他们讨论。

yingyinNormal.en: I didn't deserve it. Somehow I'd managed to convince myself that it had been all for the best.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不该被这么对待，不管怎样，我得说服自己这是最好的结局。

yingyinNormal.en: Something that will start to convince the audience that you're taking control and finally that knockout all land a blow a statement that's a memorable convincing and sums up your speeches position.
yingyinNormal.zh: 用可以说服观众的事情，让你能掌握主导权最后，做个强而有力的总结让观众留下深刻的印象且完全被你说服。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《公开场合演讲如何展现自信？》

yingyinNormal.en: Neville Chamberlain is coming north. She wants him to dine here, so she can convince him to support her.
yingyinNormal.zh: 内维尔·张伯伦要到北部来，她想让他来这里用餐，好说服他支持她。

yingyinNormal.en: I believe in you more than anyone, Claire. Then show it. Nominate me. I shouldn't have to convince you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我相信你胜过任何人，克莱尔。那表现出来，提名我，别让我再费口舌说服你。

yingyinNormal.en: It's my job to convince Congress and the American people. Your job is not to sell me on your version of my program.
yingyinNormal.zh: 说服国会和美国人民是我的工作，你们的工作不是向我推销你们的妥协方案。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, I figured I would try to convince him not to tell the story anymore, and I figure the best way to do that is face to face.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想说服他，别再提那件事，我想最好的办法就是跟他面对面谈一谈。

yingyinNormal.en: If we downplay Petrov's move as political theatrics, I might be able to convince the Israelis to follow through.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我们把佩特罗夫的行为说成政治作秀，我或许还能说服以色列人按原计划走。

yingyinNormal.en: If I can't convince you maybe she can. They wouldn't let me call you. I know it wasn't your making. What did they done to you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我不能说服你，也许她可以。他们不准我打电话你。我知道不是你不打。他们对你做了些啥？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence_trans: 并非所有人都会被这种夸夸其谈说服。

word_usage.usage:
表示“说服某人（做）某事”：
convince sb. of sth. 
convince sb. to do sth.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 令人信服地；有说服力地
adj. 有说服力的；令人信服的；绝对的

word_family.mean: v. 使确信；使信服；说服

examination_example.sentence: And if people aren't yet <highlight>convinced</highlight> by my arguments, I can give one final reason.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，如果人们还不相信我的论点，我可以给出最后一个理由。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Convincing</highlight> someone to change their mind is really the process of <highlight>convincing</highlight> them to change their tribe.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 说服别人改变主意其实就是说服他们改变自己的部落。

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>convinced</highlight> the British government to encircle the world with a chain of wireless stations using the latest technology that he had devised.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他说服英国政府利用他发明的最新技术，用一系列无线电台环绕世界。

sense_info_list.en: cause someone to believe firmly in the truth of something

examination_example.sentence: And you find yourself at Position 7, then there is little sense in trying to <highlight>convince</highlight> someone at Position 1.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后你发现自己在7号位置，那么试图说服1号位置的人就没有什么意义了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 有说服力的；令人信服的；绝对的

word_family.mean: v. 使确信；使信服；说服

examination_example.sentence: A young postman <highlight>convinces</highlight> the town’s kids to send letters to the lonely woodsman named Klaus.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一位年轻的邮递员说服镇上的孩子们给名叫克劳斯的孤独樵夫寄信。

examination_example.sentence: But then，she did everything just to <highlight>convince</highlight>(说服) me and it worked.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但后来，她所做的一切只是为了说服我，而且奏效了。
